$example searches: How many shards can I expect from the card master?
How much gem do I need to save to play cm?
What is the average shard cost in card event?

embeds.title: Card Master probability (6/8/10 rounds)
embeds.description: Statistically, doing 23 rounds of card flipping has the best value for players (results include progress bonuses).

fields.name: 6 rounds
value<text>: • 6% chance for 7 shards in 30 total flips.
• 30% chance for 6~7 shards in 28~32 total flips.
• 69% chance for 6~7 shards in 24~36 total flips.
• Average shard cost: 2314 gems.
• Recommended gem saving: 17 400 gems.
